title: 5 talking points ahead of the massive game between Sunderland and Newcastle
text:
5 talking points ahead of the massive game between Sunderland and Newcastle 
Irish Examiner Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Sunderland and Newcastle resume derby hostilities on Sunday with the Black Cats desperate to finally claim their first Barclays Premier League victory of the season. 
Here are some of the facts and figures surrounding a fixture which matters on Wearside and Tyneside. 
...
